entry.title: Calling All Grid 3.0 Testers
entry.content:
We are now ready to invite a limited group from our community to test an early release of Grid 3.0!

If you‚Äôre interested, please read through this post and answer three quick questions for us.

entry.title: An Interview with Jimber
entry.content:
Recently, Scott (from the TF Foundation) interviewed Jonas Delrue from Jimber, the team developing P2P solutions like video chat and office workspace, using the Digital Twin platform. Digital Twin is a use case on top of the ThreeFold Grid.

üí¨ You can find the interview here.

It‚Äôs quite a fascinating discussion and gives insight on the technical hurdles and motivations for developing private, decentralized, and open source alternatives to popular products from major corporations.

entry.title: TFT on 1inch.io
entry.content:
The ThreeFold Token is now available on 1inch.io!

1inch connects many third party DEXes and has its own liquidity pools as well, to provide the best possible pricing for end users. It is an easy entry to the DeFi space.

üéí Learn how to get TFT on the Binance Smart Chain using 1inch here.

entry.title: August 18 AMA Recap
entry.content:
üìπ For those who are interested in yesterday‚Äôs AMA, here is the recording.

We discussed farming (3.0), the token, ThreeFold Grid use cases, and the roadmap to ThreeFold Grid 3.0. Note the video is timestamped so you can select the questions you most care about.

entry.title: We're Hosting an AMA on August 18th
entry.content:
Please join us for an Ask Me Anything this Wednesday at 17:00 CEST!

This will be a video AMA. We‚Äôll answer questions submitted ahead of time in priority, and if there is time at the end, we will open the floor up for live questions.

You can submit questions until 12:00 CEST (48 hours) on Wednesday via the link below.

  • ‚ùì Submit your questions
  • üìπ Zoom link

If you can‚Äôt join, we‚Äôll share the recording afterwards. And we‚Äôll be hosting community AMAs on a bi-weekly basis going forward!

Additional Context

We‚Äôve heard you loud and clear lately and we‚Äôve decided to do AMAs on a regular basis with our community to answer all your questions in a more efficient way.

We‚Äôre unable to follow up on chats, hence the forum thread. This is the only solution we‚Äôve found to 1. answer all your questions and 2. keep the team focused on progress.

entry.title: Join Our Team
entry.content:
We‚Äôre looking for team members ‚Äì with operations and developer roles currently open! Join us on our mission to build a planet-positive and data sovereign Internet owned by the people.

üë©‚Äçüíª You can find open positions on our careers page.

entry.title: Watch the P2P File Browser Demo!
entry.content:
Today, we‚Äôre excited to share with you a demo of the ultra-secure peer-to-peer file browser (storage) solution that‚Äôs being built on top of the ThreeFold Grid!

This is part of a series of demos showcasing a little piece of what we‚Äôre building at the ThreeFold ‚Äì private, secure, peer-to-peer alternatives to many of the tools and experiences we all use today.

Last week, we shared a demo of the self-hosted video solution, which you can find here.

See you next time! üëã

entry.content:

entry.title: Artheon VR Museum is Coming to the Grid
entry.content:
Artheon and ThreeFold joined forces to create the world‚Äôs largest VR database of art üé® and cultural heritage ‚Äì owned by everyone and made for everyone.

üîú Coming to the ThreeFold Grid End of Q3 / Beginning Q4.

Take a peak at what museum visitors from around the world will soon be able to experience.

entry.title: ThreeFold Coverage in CoinTelegraph!
entry.content:
Today, ThreeFold received some nice coverage in CoinTelegraph:

‚ÄúThe ThreeFold Grid ‚Ä¶ can add tangible value to Dfinity or Solid and other similar projects if they want to benefit from a truly decentralized and sovereign infrastructure instead of relying on current data center models.‚Äù

üóû Full Article: Is a new decentralized internet, or Web 3.0, possible? via CoinTelegraph.

entry.title: Building a Better Solution for Our Planet
entry.content:
Today‚Äôs Internet consumes approximately 10% of the world‚Äôs energy. This is not acceptable.

So, how to fix this? Start from scratch. Attack the root problems. Build a new infrastructure. Go peer-to-peer. Reduce complexity. Improve efficiency. Work with like-minded partners. No one is taking this approach, apart from ThreeFold.

Learn more about how ThreeFold is building a better solution for our üåé.

And read about our why.

Big update to share in the coming weeks about how ThreeFold is pushing even further in this direction!

We commend all projects and individuals out there working to provide more sustainable solutions and systems for the planet. üôè

entry.title: Dive Into the ThreeFold Universe
entry.content:
Dive into threefold.io and explore the expanding ThreeFold universe!

  • üë©‚Äçüåæ Be The Internet: Become a ThreeFold Farmer

There are many ways to participate in the project. If you need support, please click the blue chat icon on any of our websites ‚Äì and with questions or conversations, head to the forum.

Thank you for being a part of the ThreeFold movement! üôè

entry.content:

entry.title: ThreeFold on Corporate Unplugged Podcast
entry.content:
Listen to ThreeFold co-founder Kristof de Spiegeleer on the Corporate Unplugged podcast.

Corporate Unplugged puts the light on impact makers in business, with past guests such as Simon Sinek & Seth Godin.

entry.title: We're Tackling Internet Inequalities
entry.content:
Let‚Äôs build an Internet for all, together.

Did you know?

ThreeFold incentivizes the expansion of the ThreeFold Grid in developing regions. üåèüåç

We are partnering with Solidaridad to create fair supply chain and fair data for farmers around the world, particularly in the Global South. ‚úÖ

And we are partnering with Take Action Global to build an educational tool based on Digital Twin technology that will allow children around the world to learn and collaborate in a secure environment. ‚úèÔ∏èüìñ

entry.title: Join Our Forum!
entry.content:
The ThreeFold Forum is the place for conversations all about ThreeFold.

Some example topics:

  • Farming FAQs & Answers
  • TF vs Centralized Cloud
  • Partner Wishlist


We'll see you over there! üëã

To participate, you‚Äôll first need to download ThreeFold Connect, a multi-purpose app which serves as an authenticator, news channel, wallet, & support platform.

  • ThreeFold Connect | App Store
  • ThreeFold Connect | Google Play

entry.title: Digital Twin v1 is Coming!
entry.content:
Recreate your digital life with Digital Twin. Where only you own your data, and no one else.

The first version of Digital Twin is coming soon and will bring private and secure messaging and video calling. After that, we‚Äôll bring you a way to store your files ‚Äì and much more.

entry.title: ThreeFold x Conscious Communities
entry.content:
We‚Äôre in talks with an already-live, large-scale ‚Äúconscious community‚Äù project to create their own independent grid of capacity!

Each home and business property would have its own node or nodes, and capacity would be used for a community-specific platform to improve communication, participation, and ease of life for residents ‚Äì all in a fully private, secure, & efficient way.

We‚Äôre still in the early stages but we‚Äôre thrilled to have met this team and to be working towards a partnership that can be an incredible model for many other communities around the world. We will share more as we are able to!

entry.title: A 2020 Rewind & Grid 2.4 News!
entry.content:
Hi all, we hope your 2021 has been off to a fabulous start!

Grid 2.4 is now live on testnet¬†(and you can start testing tomorrow).¬†This update makes it very simple for people to get started and to feel the power of what the grid can bring.

Learn more about the 2.4 update AND catch our 2020 highlights¬†here.

entry.title: Happy Holidays!
entry.content: That‚Äôs it! :) Soon, we‚Äôll share some highlights from 2020 and some words about 2021.

entry.title: Get to know TF Meet
entry.content:
Watch the live demo.

ThreeFold Meet ensures end-to-end connection between parties rather than inefficiently going through centralized servers which may be far away and lacking in privacy and security.

entry.title: ThreeFold Product Demos Are a Must Watch!
entry.content:
Demos of the latest & greatest ThreeFold products & solutions ‚Äì P2P Video Conferencing, File Browser, 0-DB Filesystem, Edge Virtual Data Center, & more ‚Äì some of which are available today & some coming soon on testnet.

Here is the full video.

In the description, you can find timestamps to guide you through, although we recommend watching the entire call.

Note: This is a recording of an internal team demo from yesterday that we decided to share with the community. We will have more details next week! Enjoy!

entry.title: Take a look at the Artheon VR Museum!
entry.content:
The Artheon Virtual Reality Museum allows visitors to explore and interact with hundreds of thousands of pieces of fine art, with or without a VR headset!

Take a tour here.

Artheon will soon be hosted on top of the ThreeFold Grid, serviced by Green Edge.

For early access and information, please join the Artheon Telegram group here.

entry.title: ThreeFold participating @ Global Reset!
entry.content:
As part of the Summit and beyond, we will be exploring what a digital reset would look like ‚Äì where you are the center of your digital life.

More about Global Reset:

The Summit brings together top teachers like John Gray, Brian Tracy, Eric Edmeades, Sri Preethaji, Chief Oren Lyons, Kristina Lakhiani from around the world to boost your relationships, health, mindset, finances, and wellbeing.

The Summit will be broadcast in 5 languages and supporting NGO‚Äôs in 11 countries to help feed the many more that are now facing starvation.

All change begins from within ourselves. Join the Global Reset Summit and take an important step towards your future self. Pay it forward by donating and making sure no one gets left behind.

entry.title: 3Bot Connect renamed to ThreeFold Connect
entry.content:
Quick update!

As mentioned as a preview in our October update, 3Bot Connect is now more accurately named ThreeFold Connect across devices.

Note: No action is required, although if you have ThreeFold Connect installed already, you may have to update the app before the name changes on your device.

entry.title: Announcing the November 2020 community call
entry.content:
Mark your calendars!

Next Monday November 2nd at 5pm CET we will host a 30-minute community call to update you on exciting progress and to show you what we‚Äôll be working towards in the coming months. We highly recommend you attend!

The following week we will host an AMA (Ask Me Anything) to answer any questions you might have related or unrelated to the community call.

Call details:

Zoom Link Meeting ID: 891 8854 3322

Google Calendar Event The room will open 10 minutes prior to the call!
